content:
Yeah, I've definitely noticed improvements in my running since starting spin classes. My legs feel stronger, and I've noticed I can maintain a faster pace during my runs. Plus, it's been nice to have a break from running and do something different.

As for nutrition and hydration, I've been trying to focus on eating more complex carbs, lean proteins, and healthy fats. I've also been making sure to drink plenty of water throughout the day. I've heard that proper nutrition and hydration are key to optimal performance, so I'm trying to prioritize those aspects of my training as well.
